summary: Added compile-time tag hashing (FNV-1a) via tag32("NAME") in src/rng.hpp to make deterministic seed salting readable and to prevent accidental invalid numeric literal suffixes.
Fixed MSVC build errors in biolum lighting: replaced an invalid hex literal suffix seed salt with tag32("BIOLUM"), keeping per-level glow selection deterministic.
Cleaned up MSVC C4456 shadowing warnings in the fluvial gully generator by renaming locals in the channel start selection and connectivity repair logic.
notes: tag32() uses a small constexpr FNV-1a hash of a string literal to generate stable 32-bit domain separation constants.
This patch is a build+infrastructure fix; gameplay impact is limited to keeping biolum light selection deterministic after the salt fix.
